title: Entity Lineage
description: This schema defines the type used for lineage of an entity.

fromColumns.description: One or more source columns identified by fully qualified column name used by transformation function to create destination column.

toColumn.description: Destination column identified by fully qualified column name created by the transformation of source columns.

function.description: Transformation function applied to source columns to create destination column. That is `function(fromColumns) -> toColumn`.

lineageDetails.description: Lineage details including sqlQuery + pipeline + columnLineage.

columnsLineage.description: Lineage information of how upstream columns were combined to get downstream column.

pipeline.description: Pipeline where the sqlQuery is periodically run.

edge.description: Edge in the lineage graph from one entity to another by entity IDs.

fromEntity.description: From entity that is upstream of lineage edge.

toEntity.description: To entity that is downstream of lineage edge.

lineageDetails.description: Optional lineageDetails provided only for table to table lineage edge.

entitiesEdge.description: Edge in the lineage graph from one entity to another using entity references.

fromEntity.description: From entity that is upstream of lineage edge.

toEntity.description: To entity that is downstream of lineage edge.

lineageDetails.description: Optional lineageDetails provided only for table to table lineage edge.

entity.description: Primary entity for which this lineage graph is created.

nodes.descriptions: All the entities that are the nodes in the lineage graph excluding the primary entity.

upstreamEdges.descriptions: All the edges in the lineage graph that are upstream from the primary entity.

downstreamEdges.descriptions: All the edges in the lineage graph that are downstream from the primary entity.
